critique: The president is trying to convey a sense of order and efficiency. There is no strong emotion conveyed, but a mild sense of satisfaction or perhaps mild surprise that the language was not uniform before. The order is issued to establish uniformity, and to restore the form which prevailed from the time the Government was established. The president is trying to convey a sense of order and efficiency. There is no strong emotion conveyed, but a mild sense of satisfaction or perhaps mild surprise that the language was not uniform before.
